item.title: Arch Linux Configuration
item.description: I currently do all of my work on a Dell XPS 9370 with an Arch Linux installation.

item.title: Building this Website
item.description: This website is written with org-mode, powered by Hugo, and hosted with Netlify.

item.title: On Style
item.description: I'm passionate about many things, one of which being my style. Let's define style as something cohesive - this style is composed of every aspect of one's life, from how they present themselves with their clothing to their organizational systems and their attitude towards their work. The curation of a set of strong, cohesive principles are able to strengthen the ability of an individual to exude greater confidence, enhance productivity, and improve livelihood.
